objective: Establish a consistent multi-agent execution protocol with shared context, lane ownership, and merge-gate discipline.
scope_in: Define required context packet fields for all implementation waves
Define lane-ownership and handoff requirements for specialist agents
Define merge gate sequence and evidence requirements
Document blocker escalation and dependency update protocol
scope_out: Introducing new service APIs solely for coordination
Replacing existing runtime/agent-runs status file format
implementation_checklist: Document shared operating context packet template in docs
Document inter-agent orchestration protocol and single-writer lane model
acceptance_criteria: Agents can execute a wave with explicit ownership and no ambiguous responsibilities
Each merge candidate includes required handoff evidence
Docs clearly describe how agents coordinate and escalate blockers
risks: Coordination rules drift if not tied to merge gate behavior
Mitigation: lead-orchestrator enforces evidence requirements before merge
